c.t: .06 Transportation Conformity — Conflict Resolution Associated with Conformity Determinations.

c.x: Explain the nature of the conflict;
Review options for resolving the conflict;
Describe the MPO's or agency's proposal to resolve the conflict;
Explain the consequences of not reaching a resolution; and
Request that comments on the matter be received within 2 weeks.
